mapper.select: select countrycode value, namecn name from m_country order by case when countrycode=156 then 0 else 1 end

select id value, name from m_department where status=0
and (id=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or parentid=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
order by id

select r.spid value, r.name name from m_simpool r left join m_department d on r.departmentId=d.id and d.status=0 where 1=1
and (d.id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or d.parentId= #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select distinct p.id value, p.name from m_simpackage p left join m_department d on (p.departmentId=d.id or p.departmentId=d.parentId) and d.status=0 where p.status=0
and operatorCode = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (d.id=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or d.parentId=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) or p.departmentId = 0
order by p.id
select provincecode value, namecn name from m_province where countryCode=#{countryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by sort
select m.mcc value, concat(c.namecn,'(',m.mcc,')') name from m_country_mcc m,m_country c where m.countrycode=c.countrycode order by case when m.countryCode=156 then 0 else 1 end
